entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:06 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:06 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
